商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: C - 白色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: I liked the look of this top; casual/comfy but could be spiced up a bit. Liked the elongation effect of the vertical ribbing. Material flowed nicely. However it is a thin blend so the white was see-thru; hence a 4 vs 5 star. Could even see slight difference between color of  beige bra and my skin even tho it's loose fitting. Would be fine with cami underneath but i didn't want to do that. I'm a 38/40D at 215'ish so got 2XL. Was juuust tad to big so if on fence with 2 sizes, I'd suggest ordering down. Ordered the green and black also so expecting those will be 5-star.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: C-floral-1尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: The blouse is soft and flattering. Fits as expected. Looks cute with jeans or dress pants.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
留言內容: I bought several shirts from this company, LOMON, in two different styles, and I have loved every one of them. This style has a v-neck and the sleeves have a hemmed cuff, instead of the elasticized and ruffled wrists on the other two. All of them have pin tucking in the front and are loose fitting and very comfortable.  You could tuck it in or belt it too. The material is nice and soft, not too heavy and definitely not flimsy, like some are. It also came in lots of different colors, so there is something for almost everyone. I love this top and I'd recommend it to anyone who is looking for comfort, style and good quality.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: C-floral-1尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Wow there are a lot of shirts to choose from in this listing. I ordered a long sleeve, pink & blue small flower print v-neck, with 2 strips on ribbing running vertically down the front. It is a slick, smooth, cooling fabric with a forgiving, loose bottom. Its has just enough style to not be boring, but not be over the top. It's very comfortable and washes well. I'm going to wear it all the time.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: A-黑色/粉紅色花卉尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: These shirts were a gift and the recipient is so pleased with the fit and quality!  6’ tall, 160 lbs and XL is long enough and fit loosely but comfortably and nice.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: C - 白色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: I love this lightweight shirt! Soft, not too long and very flattering. Fitted - but not tight-  through the shoulders and bust and flares out slightly over the hips with a nice curved hem. I'm 5'8", 205# and the xxl fits perfectly - sleeve length is just right also. Hopefully it won't shrink after washing, but I will probably wash in cold water and hang to dry. Going to order more in different colors and patterns.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: A-黑色尺寸: Medium
留言內容: This shirt is super cute and comfortable. Fabric doesn’t wrinkle easily and looks flattering on different body types.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: C-floral-1尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: This shirt was so soft when I took it out of the bag that I laid my cheek on it. I'm serious.Then I tried it on with shorts, jeans, leggings, and dress pants. It looked good no matter what I paired it with.Right now we are bidding a fairly long farewell to summer but as soon as the temps cool a bit, I will pull it out and wear it. It is so comfy and I just can't get over how soft it is.Treat yourself to the most comfy long-sleeved shirt you've ever owned.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: A-花卉藍尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: I really liked everything about this top, but in the sizing chart, I fell between two sizes, and they recommended that in that case, to go up one size. On this particular top, it was loose and flowy enough that I should have gone with the smaller size, so I returned it today and then repurchased it in the smaller size and will get it in the next day or two.  I’m sure I’ll love it.  Very nice, smooth, soft drapey fabric.

With the heat wave, we’ve been having this summer, temperatures in the triple digits for a few weeks now, I find that if I wear this outside to a function, it gets pretty sticky.

I'll keep it and try a large in a different pattern.Okay, updating. The large was way too large so I'm sticking with the medium size. I would definitely recommend the style that's pleated in the front. It's a little more form-fitting up top while being loose enough to not cling to the rest of you.

留言內容: This is a very flattering style on me and I normally wear a large, but it was snug through the chest (I am a 36 D). I ordered a similar style in XL and it works better. I will keep this one since I am hoping to lose weight and even now it doesn't look bad.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: 紅色花卉尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: This blouse was shipped in its clear plastic bag, with nothing to provide privacy.  No thought given that maybe you don't want the world to know what size clothes you are ordering.  Is this a new method to reduce cost?I  do think the shirt is cute but in my opinion it runs small.

SKU: 顏色: C - 綠色尺寸: Medium

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: 米色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: For the lighter shirts, you definitely will need a nude or white tank on underneath. Also, if you want the flowy look like the pic, get a size up. I was disappointed in the snug fit and see-throughness, but is otherwise a nice shirt.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: B-紫紅色尺寸: Medium
留言內容: This top has a unique design and is made from quality material.  I like how it looks with my work pants.  I typically wear a medium...definitely would not size down when ordering this top.  This M is a little snug on me.  I have received several compliments when wearing this top.  It's comfortable and different from my other tops, so I plan on ordering more colors for work.I added the blue shirt on this review.  I love this t-shirt...it's SO comfortable with a little flare.  The sleeves dress it up enough for work or it could be worn with shorts, etc. A good find...

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: A-黑色/粉紅色花卉尺寸: Medium
留言內容: This top is a great length - not so long on my 5'3" frame that it looks like pajamas, but long enough to hang over my waist - it's flowy and loose. The v-neck and flutter sleeves cover nicely, but still look pretty and dressy. The only issue is that the flutter sleeves flop, and the underside of the fabric is a lot lighter, so if you're outside in the wind, they don't stay put and it would be less obvious if the underside of the sleeves were dark, too. The sleeves and neck are really pretty and flattering, though. The fabric is soft, but again, not like pajama material, and it's not that cheap silky fabric that can be unnaturally shiny looking in person. I got the dark background with the reddish/dark pink flowers, and that small print works well - it's not overwhelming.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: B-floral-2尺寸: Small
留言內容: This top seems true to size.  I bought it for a gift, very cute.

商品名稱: LOMON 女款 上衣 洋裝 休閒 夏季 蓬鬆 袖 T 恤 荷葉邊 短袖 寬鬆 V 領 長版上衣
SKU: 顏色: 深綠色尺寸: Large
留言內容: I was leery at first, purchasing any clothing without touching it first can be difficult, but this shirt exceeded my expectations! The fit was right, the color was lovely, and it looked polished with a nice pair of pants!
